title: Revert application code to Draft 38

requirements.text: Revert the current draft codebase back to the exact state of Draft 38 (frontend + backend), replacing any changes introduced after Draft 38.

quotes: Please revert back to Draft 38 now

acceptanceCriteria: The generated code in this draft matches Draft 38 behavior and UI as previously deployed/reviewed.
No postâ€“Draft 38 changes remain in the frontend or backend after the revert.
The app builds successfully (frontend + backend) after reverting to Draft 38.

constraints: Do not modify the read-only frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT. (If Draft 38 included changes in those paths, achieve the revert by adjusting surrounding/composing code instead of editing those files.)
nonGoals: Do not introduce new features or bug fixes beyond restoring the Draft 38 state.
Do not perform any additional redesign or content changes not present in Draft 38.
